name: Fruit Salad Space Catch [Reborn!]
description:
In space no one will give you cream (for your fruit salad) That's ripe! Freaky looking alien fruit tastes the best! It's your mission to harvest those UFO's (undeniably fruity objects) and juice up your fruit powered death machine to hunt down some space slime! (punnet intended)

Catch1 CONTROLS

Left > Right 

(WASD/Arrows)

Blast1 CONTROLS

Left>Right>Up>Down

(WASD/Arrows)

Jam Cannon

Mouse Aim/Left Mouse Fire

Bananistic Missile

Right Mouse Fire
